content:
# Multicultural Day 2025

URL: http://www.unesco.agh.edu.pl/aktualnosci/multicultural-day-2025/
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:39:49

UNESCO AGH Multicultural Day 2025
Join us for 
UNESCO AGH Multicultural Day 2025
, a vibrant celebration of diversity and global unity organized by UNESCO AGH Chair! Our Fellows will showcase the rich cultures and traditions of Bangladesh, Dominican Republic, Ethiopia, India, Kenya, Madagascar, Malawi, Mongolia, Nigeria, Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Syria, Tanzania, Thailand, The Bahamas, Togo, Uganda, and Vietnam. Experience mesmerizing dances, heartfelt poems, and captivating songs that highlight the beauty of each culture. Discover unique customs, traditional attire, and artistic performances from around the world. This special event is an opportunity to connect, learn, and celebrate cultural heritage together. Don’t miss this unforgettable experience! To attend the event prior registration is required.
To register please visit: 
http://mcd2025.uniune-events.agh.edu.pl/
Date: 27.02.2025
Place: AGH University of Krakow, Poland
